div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
quinto die februarij anno quo supra

The saide day patry gordone of methtlik grantit that he
hed' tane the kyst follouit be Johne mar' procurator to Johne
leslie of Warderis and to Releiwe Jonhne of murray tharof
and it be fundin wrang

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to
Duky gilrutht tile ansuer' to the borghe fundin one him
be Alexander moresone for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xiij s'
and iiij d'

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit this day
viij dais to Jonhne of murray to Ansuer' to the borghe fundin
one him be Jonhne leslie of bvrges of Abirdene for the wrang
uis' Intrometing with ane kyst with Certane gudis quhilk was takin
out of his hous' as Is mair' at lintht contenit in the saide borghe'

The saide day It was deliuerit and ordanit be ane Suorne assis'
gilbert menyeis forspekar that gif euere Dauy litstar comittis ony
effence tile ony of his craft in tyme to Cum and beis conuict
tharof sal pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin
becaus' of the Offence done to gilbert litstar at the sitacione
of Candilmes play

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ixo die februarij anno
quo supra

The saide day ormvnde leslie grantit to gif to Johne Ramsay his avne pont
and he may get it or ellis als' gude ane pont

add.foreign: Solucio iiij li' per Johannem Wormet

div.p:
The saide day Alexander menyeis aldirman grantit that he and thomas leslie ane of the
ballies hede resauit fra Jonhne Wormet four' lib' of money tharof xl s'
to thar expensis quhen thai passit to the montht and vthir xl s' to Johne of mar'
quhen he passit to the chakir quhilkis iiijor li' salbe allouit in Alexander of
marris wattir maile of his hald nethis fischingis of the Raik

head.add: ane burgis grantit to the aldirmannis wif

div.p:
The saide day the Counsal present grantit ane burges to be maid' at the
Request of the aldirmannis wyf quhen scho gerris present him

The saide day Ormvnde leslie grantit him aving to Johne of Retray
vj s' and viij quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Alexander gray forspekar
that Johne of Rattre skinnis was skathit in mavnys Skipparis schip
Ande the saide mavnis sal vpricht the skatht of the saide Skinnis say
mekle' as the said' Johne cane preiwe his skinnis skathit and him
throw the saide Skinnis within the saide Schipe

The saide day magis still was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Dauy
blinsel forspekar for strubulance of Alexander horne et cetera Ande forthir gif euere
the said magis strubulis the saide Alexander or ony vthir and beis conuicit
tharof sal pay to Sanct nicholes werk xl s' vnforgevin

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xijo
die mensis februarij Anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit friday that next cumis to
Jonhne Sanclar tile Ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be William rolland'
that he awe to freithe and releiwe him of fywe schillingis of annuele Rent
and his lande at the handis of mastir thomas chamer

The saide day the Court wardit schewe for law and It was gevin for dome
that it was Sufficientlie preuit that Jonhne arthour' and Dauy hay was
bundin to stand' at the ordinance and deliuerance of thomas hay Androw
Cullane Duncan Colisone and Wat hay / Anent fiwe stane of woll and thai
happinit tile accorde in thar deliuerance quhilkis Accordit and ordanit
the saide J Dauy to pay tua stane and demi stane of woll to the saide
Johne and gif the man that the saide Dauy was dettour for happinis to
cum hame he sal entir him within the towne to the pament of the said' vthir ij pec' and
half stane of woll

The saide day the ballieis assignit friday that next cumis to Johne
of leslie of Warderis and Johne of mar' his procurator to preiwe the kyst
clamit be thame being in Johne of murrays hous' ayrschip to the ayris
of vmquhile thomas prat quhome gode assoilye

The saide day the aldirman ballieis and Counsall present for the tyme assig
nit to margaret of Kintor the relict of vmquhile Williame of chamer
the malys of thar' half nethis fischingis of the mydchingile quhilkis
Johne of Auchneiwe now Occupeis and Jos' for ale the termes of
Sextene yeris Immediatlie to be Runnyn quhais handis that euire scho It
happinis to be in to the frethin and releving of the malys of hir
thridpart of nethis fischingis one the wattir of Done assignit to Sanct
Nicholes werk quhilk Is Set to hir maile fre

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo tercio
die februarij Anno quo supra

The saide day Robert g Thome glenny was in amerciament of the court
be ane suorne assis' Williame Wormet forspekar for strublance of Androw
sleicht / Ande the saide Androw was conuikit for the strublance of the said thome
And' ilkane tile amend tile vtheris as law will and forber in tyme tocum

head.add: the prising of sere William sanclaris boit

div.p:
The saide day personalie comperit patry Rede Jonhne rede thomas menyeis and
thomas ridaill at commavnde of the aldirman and ballieis chosin and Suorne In
presence of Jonhne of mar' procurator for sere Williame Sanclar and Jonhne fechat partiis
quhilkis eftir thar aithez' the gret bodelie aithe cumande betuix prisit the boit of
sere Williame Sanclar that the saide Johne fechat Intromettit with was worth tene
pundis vsual money of Scotland In the tyme that the saide Jhone Intromettit with
hir' ale concording in ane voce

The saide day it was Sufficientlie preuit that Williame Scrimgeor officiar' at
commavnde of the ballies arrestit Jonhne fechatis boit for the pament fo sere
Williame Sanclaris boit optenit vpone the saide Johne

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvjo die februarij
anno quo supra

The saide day the borghe' fundin be Wat Dougles one gilbert henry that he
promittit to marrow demi nethis with him and wrangit that he did' It nocht
was fundin of nay avale be ane suorne assis' patry leslie forspekar for the
the quhilkis the said' Walter was in ane Amerciament of the court and the said' gilbert quyt
of his challance et cetera

The saide day Alexander gray youngar grauntit him borghe' and dettour to Johne Arthour
for xxxix s' Scottis money for the lady of fouerne quhilkis the ballieis him
to pay within terme of law

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Robert blinsele forspekar
that mavnis skippar is quyt of the wranguis' Intrometing of four' half
barrellis of Saip follouit be Jonhne Annand' Johne talyour' and vthiris thir nychtbouris
and the borghe' fundin tharupon' was of nayn availl

The saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Robert blinsele
forspekar that Jonhne blak and his fallouis sale content and pay to Johne annand'
and Johne talyour' alsmekle for tua hald barrellis of the saip disponit in Yar
moutht in Inglande et cetera as thai may haue for thame within this borghe' the
saidz Johne annande and Johne talyour payand' the fraucht tharof Ande
the gudis beinge within mavnis schipe sale lott and pay the tothir tua demi
barrellis of Saipe siclik as thai mycht haue for thar saip now in
Abirdene

The saide day Dauy Sraloche deponit be his aithe that the kyst clamyt airschipe
be Jonhne leslie of Warderis and Johne of mar' his procurator being within Jonhne' of marris
hous was the best kyst that vmqhuile thomas prat hed'

Johne Retre deponit be his aithe it was the best kist that euere he sawe in his hous'
or wyst him haue in his tyme
Cristy prat deponit et cetera it was his best kyst
Johne Kintor deponit et cetera it was his best kyst

The saide day the court wardit schewe for law and It was gevin for dome that the
kyst follouit be Johne leslie and his procuratoris one Johne of murray was
ayrschip to the ayris of vmquhile thomas prat

Eodem die Johannes Waus deuenit plegius legalis quod gilbertus henry erit Indempnes pro Waltero
Dougles aliter quam per viam Juris Et patricius rede deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus
Walterus erit Indempnis pro dicto henrico aliter quam per viam Juris

The saide day Comperit honest and fathtfull mene thomas meldrum William
Ramsone and Androw michelsone In the nayme and behalf of the Remanent
of the craftismen of the cordonaris of the saide burghe for the plesour of gode his
blissit modir the virgine mary Sanct nicholes and Sanctis crispinj and crispinianj in
Augmentacione of divine seruice affirmit ratifeit and appreuit the lettir vndir the
Secret sele of the saide burghe maide and grantit to sere Jhone litster thar chaplan
of the altar of Sanctis crispinj and crispinianj Ande deliuerit the saide lettir to the saide
sere Johne out of the said' thomas meldrumis handis Ande the aldirman balyeis
and Counsal present for the tyme Consent tharto and Affermit the samyn to the plesour'
of gode and haly kirk Ande Alexander Ranisone befor Johne of mar' ane of the
balyeis affermit ale thingis that the saide thomas William and androw did' In the said
matir

The saide day Jonhne fechat tuk to preiwe one friday that nixt
cumis befor the aldirman and ballieis that the arrest maide one his
boit was lauchfullie lousit to him

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene xxiij die mensis feb
ruarij anno quo supra

The saide day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais to Dun
can gilrutht Abregat'

The saide day Duncan gilrutht lauchsullie callit and nocht comperit
tile ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be Alexander moreson' for the
wranguis haldin fra him of xiij s' and iiij d' et cetera tharfor the balyeis ordanit
Androw gilbert prestone officiar' to pas' and tak ane distres' of the saide
Duncanis and lat it Agan to borghe' and It be askit and warne him
to this day xv dais to ansuer to the said' borghe as secund'
day of proces'

The saide day Will Rat grantit he was nay prenteis to Richard'
redhede for his prenteischip was gane furtht

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis chargit and ordanit the
flessaris In the kingis name and tharis that thai by nay salmond'
in hous' nor In the mercat and Sell derrar to thar profit
bot j d' of the Schilling

The saide day Johne of fechat grantit he hede assignit his boit
to margaret Kintor for pament of xix s' at michaelmes' day
last bigane

The saide day Androw meldrum deponit be his aithe he sellit his
Saip for vj d' the punde

The saide day the court wardit schewe for law and It was
gevin for dome that Johne fechat hade falyet in his prewe
of the arrest lousing of his boit quhilk he tuk to preiwe
this Instant day

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxvjo die mensis februarij anno quo supra

The saide day It was ordanit fundin and deliuerit be the aldirman and consal
that thome Ridall sal Inputt the comptour' pertening' to Isabele of
buchane and Dauy colp hir tutor in the hall quhar' William Rollande
duellis

The saide day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais to Williame Colp
procurator to Dauy Colp tile ansuer' to the borghe' fundin on him
be thome Ridall that the saide Dauy awe to releiwe his pundis
takin be sere Androw gray for x s' of annuell et cetera and discernit the copy
of the said' borghe' to the saide Williame one his expens'

The saide day Johne Colisone grauntit him to pay thankfully
to Williame buchane baxtar sex firlotis of quhet Sufficient
merchande gude with the mercat mell of the next yeris groving
for the Recompens' of the wattir' outlettin of the loche

Eodem die Alexander menyeis prepositus Johannes leslie de Warderis +
gilbertus menyeis Andreas Cullane + Johannes ruthirfurde miles
Robertus blinsele Alexander chamer Dauid menyes Jacobus Colison'
et Alexander gray electi fuerunt commissarij ad parliamentum domini nostri
Regis Inchoandum et tenedum Apud Edinburghe die lune xjo die
mensis marcij proxime future et cetera

The saide day the ballieis assingit friday that next cumis to Syme robertson'
tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Alexander prat for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of ane Ros' nobile

Curia balliuirum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo die
mensis marcij anno quo supra

The saide day Androw Cullane James Colisone Williame portar Alexander gray
Johne blak patry leslie and george bisset was chosin ande Suorne
the gret bodelie aithe' tile extent the Some of

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto
die marcij Anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman ballieis ande diuers' of the Counsale and communite
present for the tyme grauntit ande Consentit that Johne auchneiwe
salbe fre of the lest termes maile of his hald nethis fischingis
of the mydchingill quhilk he has in tak of the tone be caus' he
pait ane termes maile of the saide fischingis at his Entre

The saide day the baillies Chargit Symon Ellone to tutor Rob man'
betuix this day fiftene dais befor thame tile ansuer tile Johnne Arthour
for sevin schillingis for ane bonet or ellis to pay the said vij s' as he
that grantit that he suld entir the said Robert /

head.add: the personis conuict' for occupeing of craftis and merchandice

div.p:
The said day Androw litster Thomas meldrum Johnne flessour
Williame Ranysone Alexander prat thomas lamyntone was conuict
be thir personys vnder writin that is to say Dauid menyeis Robert blinsele
Johnne lesly of Warderis sere Johnne ruthirfurd' alexander Red' Alexander
Chawmer Androw cullan James collisone Johnne Wormet Alexander
mar' Williame portar Dauid mar Johnne blak Androw fyf
Willeame Wormet Duncan collisone mathow branche Alexander
gray Dauid murray Johnne Annand' patrik lesly georg
bisset patry Red' Williame Kyntor Dauid fynne and Dauid
Adamsone suorne in ane assis' for the wrangwis' occupacioun' of tua
Craftis that is to say of merchandice ande thar avin craftis ffor
the quhilkis Ilkane of thame was in amerciament of the court
and tile Amend' as law wile Ande to desist fra the occupeing
of ane of the said craftis / and to tak thame tharto and to forber in
tyme tocum and that was gevin for dome'

head.add: Statut for occupearis of merchandice and craftis

div.p:
The saide day It was Statut ande ordanit be the haile Counsale that nayn'
of the personis contenit in the Act Immediate obefor and conuict for occupeing of thar
Craftis and merchandice to giddir occupy bot ane craft othir merchandice or ane
craft and to cheis' thame quhilk of thame thai ples' and forbeir' the tothir Ande that
the aldirman nor' denys of gilde sal nocht compone with thame nor Suffir thame nor
thar gudis saile According to our Souerane lordis lettres and actis of parliament Ande ordanit
the aldirman bring hame our Souerane lordis lettres with him tharuppone

The saide day Androw litstar was conuict be the saide assis' for forstalling of the burghe in bying
of woll hidis and Skinnis Thomas meldrum Williame Ranisone conuict for forstalling of
the burgh In bying of hidis Alexander prat Johne flessour and thome lammyntone conuict for
forstalling of the burghe' in bying of woll hidis and skinnis for the quhilkis Ilkan of tham
was in ane Amerciament of the court be the saide assis' and to Amende as law wil and forber'
In tyme to cum et cetera

The saide day Alexander hay Androw litstar thome meldrum Johne portar henry bavne Johne
patirsone alexander prat Dauid talyour Wile Walcar' Williame Ranisone Johne grene Roberte
flessour Arthour soutar / Androw beltar alexander talyour James Kennertj Johne Rede wobstar Johne litstar
Androw brabner' Will loremar' Johne low smytht Johne loremar' thome lammyntone Richerde
redhede and Johne arthour was conuict be the saide suorne assis' for brekin of common ordinance
and in contrar' that aithis becaus' thai walde nocht do as nichtburis and vthiris dide et cetera

The day of the monethe of march the yer forsaide Alexander menyeis aldirman
schew tile Alexander mar' that the commissaris of the assedacioun diuisit and ordanit thame of
fyffis demi nethis of the Raik to marrow with him Ande he chargit him to marrowe
with the said' demi nethis
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xjo marcij anno quo supra

The saide day Williame colp procurator to Dauy Colp lauchfullie callit and nocht compe
rit to ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one the saide Dauy be thome ridall that he awe
to releiwe his pundis takin be sere Androu gray for x s' of annuele tharfor the balyeis
ordanit gilbert prestone sergeande to pas' and tak ane streis' of the saide Williamis
and lat it agane to borghe' and it be askit and warne him to Comper one tuysday
cum xv dais becaus' our lady day fallis one the monunday as Secunde day of proces'

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' patry leslie forspekar that Johne
malisone sulde fynde to Duncan Colison ane half Cobile to marrow with
him this yer' or ellis pay him half ane Cobill hyer' becaus' it was
Referrit to his aithe and he refusit to Sueir'

The saide day Johne berehill sclatar was conuict be ane Suorne assis' patry
leslie forspekar for strubulance of Alexander sclatar and his wyf and for the quhilk he
was in Ane amerciament of the court et cetera Ande gif euere he committis ony sic trespas'
and beis conuict tharof he sal pay j li' of waxe to the haly blud licht
